issue.title: [CF 226] I like long ticket names: an exposition on why unit cooldown icons should listen to abilities that reset cooldowns
issue.body:
I wonder if CurseForge has a title length limit on tickets...

Anyway - make cooldowns properly reset with abilites like cold snap and readiness and that elemental shaman thing for lava burst and stuff.

This is turning into more of a todo list for me... at least I won't forget things here or lose them, though.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #226 | Raw
